Detailed Description

TREX observation definition.

This file provides interfaces and utilities to create and manipulate observations exchanged between reactors.

Deprecated:
the current implementation of observations is not as flexible and transparent as desired and may change drastically in the future
Author:
Frederic Py <fpy@mbari.org>
